abstract: Citigroup said on Wednesday that it was naming Cindy Armine as its new chief compliance officer, putting a longtime executive in charge of policing the giant global bank.
snippet: Citigroup said on Wednesday that it was naming Cindy Armine as its new chief compliance officer, putting a longtime executive in charge of policing the giant global bank.
lead_paragraph: From Eric Dash, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Citi Names a New Compliance Chief
